system.description: You conjure an extradimensional dwelling with a single entrance on the plane from which the spell was cast. The entry is a faint shimmer 4 ft. wide and 8 ft. high. Only designated creatures may enter; the portal closes and becomes invisible behind you. You can open it from your side at will. Inside is a magnificent foyer with chambers beyond; the atmosphere is clean, fresh, and warm. You can create any floor plan to the limit of the spell's effect. The place is furnished and contains food for a nine-course banquet for a dozen people per caster level. A staff of near-transparent servants (two per caster level) wait upon all who enter; they function as unseen servant except they are visible and can go anywhere in the mansion. Outside conditions do not affect the mansion.

components.materialDescription: Focus: a miniature portal carved from ivory, a small piece of polished marble, and a tiny silver spoon (each worth 5 gp).

system.target: Extradimensional mansion, up to three 10-ft. cubes/level (S)
